channel.title: Webclient page help?
channel.description:
Ok so i'm trying to make it so i can have a normal webclient and i got a code here [code]<html> <title> AssassinPKS </title> <body onbeforeunload="javascript:alert('Be sure your account is logged out before closing this page!');"> <applet name="AssassinPKS" width="100%" height="100%" archive="https://dl.dropbox.com/u/100360252/AssassinPKS.jar" code="loader.class" mayscript=""> <param name="worldid" value="2"/> <param name="members" value="1"/> <param name="modewhat" value="2"/> <param name="modewhere" value="2"/> <param name="safemode" value="1"/> <param name="lang" value="0"/> <param name="affid" value="0"/> <param name="settings" value="ROEqp2kbj*NX9PSCbdgpOvokkMwrCkXjg3c6KXgaLZY"/> <param name="cookieprefix" value=""/> <param name="cookiehost" value=".google.com"/> <param name="plug" value="0"/> <param name="js" value="1"/> <param name="game" value="0"/> <param name="colourid" value="0"/> </applet> </body> </html> [/code]
so i'm wondering how i can put that on my webs.com site this is what my webclient looks like now and i dont really like it, i used the html widget u can see there http://gyazo.com/b12c578830be5d462710b3d859f4c886 thats what it looks like right now, so how can i get rid of that normal template and make the page only my html code? thanks! also please dont tell me not to use webs.com or w.e

item.title: Webclient page help?
item.dc:creator: @AssassinsCRB AssassinsCRB
item.description:
@AssassinsCRB wrote:

Ok so i’m trying to make it so i can have a normal webclient and i got a code here

[code]

so i’m wondering how i can put that on my webs.com site this is what my webclient looks like now and i dont really like it, i used the html widget u can see there

also please dont tell me not to use webs.com or w.e
